events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product does not meet my expectations.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' due to customer's mention of requesting money back for an incorrect product.
Agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request and customer case starting immediately.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I'll be assisting you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund promptly, may I also know if the item was opened or used at all, and if you have the packaging available?
My order number is 123456789. The package is unopened and still sealed, as I just found out it was the wrong product when it arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the item at no extra cost.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and for covering the return shipping. I appreciate your help!
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days. The return label has been emailed to you.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Everything went smoothly, and I’m happy with the service. Thanks again!
Thank you for confirming. We are closing this case now. Please don’t hesitate to contact us again if you need anything else.
